title: The walls around public media keep coming down
description: When I joined Hawaiʻi Public Radio a year and a half ago, the welcome from the team and the community was warm and full of aloha. This was not surprising. What was unexpected were the dozens of strangers from across the country reaching out to say “Welcome to Public Media!” The message came from station heads and staff across...
